item.description:
We are trying something new... How about Happy Hour the first Wednesday of Every month?

Join us at the "New" Drift Away Restaurant (formerly Abercrombie & Finch) for a special they have every Wednesday night it's called "WOW" Wine on Wednesdays... Your first glass is only .25 cents..

We will be joining folks from 2 other meetup groups "Eat, Drink & Be Merry" & the "Boston Ski Meetup" for this monthly venue!

The first few Wet Wednesdays will be at the Drift Away in No Hampton, NH... When the weather gets warmer we will try the beautiful deck at "Castaway's" in Seabrook.

Hope to see you there it will be fun!
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the Group from "Eat, Drink & Be Merry"

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: It's "Wet Wednesday".. .25 cents first wine/The first Wednesday of the month!
